CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 29, 1952, pg. 14 reads: "Your Community Chest at Work - These photographs are published as a public service to highlight and point up the impact of various Community Chest agencies on the lives of thousands of local Negroes every day...Dr. Bryn J. Hovde, one of the nation's top authorities in field of housing, is the director of the Pittsburgh Housing Association, a private agency devoted to research and coordination in this vital field. Dr. Hovde and his assistant director, Roland M. Sawyer, formerly a race relations consultant of the Federal Housing Administration, in the top right photo, survey a map of the city...Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Director of Pittsburgh Housing Association Dr. Bryn J. Hovde, and Assistant Director Roland M. Sawyer looking at map of Pittsburgh
